remediation: Upgrade github.com/cubefs/cubefs/master to version 3.3.1 or higher.
title: Information Exposure

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Information Exposure due to users' secret keys and access keys being leaked in the logs in multiple components. A lower-privileged user with access to the logs can retrieve sensitive information and impersonate other users with higher privileges than themselves.

source_code.diff:
@@ -106,7 +106,7 @@ func (u *User) createKey(param *proto.UserCreateParam) (userInfo *proto.UserInfo
 	}
 	u.userStore.Store(userID, userInfo)
 	u.AKStore.Store(accessKey, AKUser)
-	log.LogInfof("action[createUser], userID: %v, accesskey[%v], secretkey[%v]", userID, accessKey, secretKey)
+
 	return
 }
